	According to the Paperwork Reduction Act of 1995, an agency may not conduct or sponsor, and a person is not required to respond to a collection of information unless it displays a valid OMB control number. The valid OMB control number for this information collection is 0596-0082. The time required to complete this information collection is estimated to average one (1) hour per response, including the time for reviewing instructions, searching existing data sources, gathering and maintaining the data needed, and completing and reviewing the collection of information.

	The U.S. Department of Agriculture (USDA) prohibits discrimination in all its programs and activities on the basis of race, color, national origin, age, disability, and where applicable, sex, marital status, familial status, parental status, religion, sexual orientation, genetic information, political beliefs, reprisal, or because all or part of an Individual's income is derived from any public assistance. (Not all prohibited bases apply to all programs.) Persons with disabilities who require alternative means for communication of program information (Braille, large print, audiotape, etc.) should contact USDA's TARGET Center at 202-720-2600 (voice and TDD).
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	To file a complaint of discrimination, write USDA, Director, Office of Civil Rights, 1400 Independence Avenue, SW, Washington, DC 20250-9410 or call toll free (866) 632-9992 (voice). TDD users can contact USDA through local relay or the Federal relay at (800) 877- 8339 (TDD) or (866) 377-8642 (relay voice). USDA is an equal opportunity provider and employer.

<EFX_EXPERTS_CONSENT>
<A NAME="FIS_EXPERTS_CONSENT"></A>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	Consent of Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">

</DIV>

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	The Board of Directors
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	Intrawest Resorts Holdings, Inc.:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	We consent to the incorporation by reference in the registration statement (No. 333-193672) on Form S-8 of Intrawest Resorts Holdings, Inc., of our report dated September 8, 2016, with respect to the consolidated balance sheets of Intrawest Resorts Holdings, Inc. as of June 30, 2016 and 2015, and the related consolidated statements of operations and comprehensive income (loss), equity, and cash flows for each of the years in the three-year period ended June 30, 2016, and the related financial statement schedule, Schedule II - Valuation and Qualifying Accounts and Reserves, which report appears in the June 30, 2016 annual report on Form 10-K of Intrawest Resorts Holdings, Inc.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">

	EXHIBIT&#160;24.1
</DIV>
<EFX_POWER_OF_ATTORNEY>
<A NAME="FIS_POWER_OF_ATTORNEY"></A>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; PADDING-TOP: 12PX; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	POWER OF ATTORNEY
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-TOP: 12PX; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%; TEXT-INDENT: 32PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	KNOW ALL BY THESE PRESENTS
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT">
	, that the undersigned does hereby constitute and appoint each of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Karen Sanford
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Travis Mayer,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT">
	signing singly, the undersigned&#8217;s true and lawful attorney-in-fact and agent to (1) execute for and on behalf of the undersigned, a director of Intrawest Resorts Holdings, Inc., a Delaware corporation (the &#8220;Company&#8221;), any Annual Report on Form 10-K; and (2) do and perform any and all acts for and on behalf of the undersigned that may be necessary or desirable to complete and execute any such Annual Report on Form 10-K, to file such Annual Report on Form 10-K, with all exhibits thereto, and other documents in connection therewith, and to complete, execute and file any amendments to any of them, with the United States Securities and Exchange Commission, and any stock exchange or similar authority, as required. The undersigned does hereby grant to each such attorney-in-fact and agent full power and authority to do and perform each and every act and thing requisite, necessary or proper to be done in the exercise of any of the rights and powers herein granted, as fully to all intents and purposes as the undersigned might or could do if personally present, with full power of substitution or revocation, and does hereby ratify and confirm all that said attorney-in-fact and agent, or any of them, or their substitutes or substitute, may lawfully do or cause to be done by virtue of this Power of Attorney and the rights and powers herein granted.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-TOP: 12PX; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%; TEXT-INDENT: 32PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	IN WITNESS WHEREOF
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT">
	, I, the undersigned, have hereunto signed my name and caused this Power of Attorney to be duly executed as of the date indicated below.
</FONT>
</DIV>

<A NAME="eolPage179"></A>
<A NAME="EX31_1_HTM"></A>
<EFX_EXHIBIT_31>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_31"></A>
<DIV>
<HR STYLE="HEIGHT: 4PX; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-LEFT: AUTO; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-RIGHT: AUTO" ALIGN="CENTER" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	EXHIBIT&#160;31.1
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION"></A>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	CERTIFICATION OF PERIODIC REPORT UNDER SECTION&#160;302 OF
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	I, Thomas F. Marano, certify that:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	1. I have reviewed this annual report on Form&#160;10-K of Intrawest Resorts Holdings, Inc.;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	2. Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	3. Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	4. The registrant&#8217;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&#160;13a-15(e)&#160;and 15d-15(e)) for the registrant and have:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; PADDING-LEFT: 48PX; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	a) Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; PADDING-LEFT: 48PX; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; PADDING-LEFT: 48PX; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	b) Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant&#8217;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; PADDING-LEFT: 48PX; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; PADDING-LEFT: 48PX; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	c) Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant&#8217;s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant&#8217;s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting; and
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	5. The registrant&#8217;s other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant&#8217;s auditors and the audit committee of the registrant&#8217;s board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; PADDING-LEFT: 48PX; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	a) All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant&#8217;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; PADDING-LEFT: 48PX; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; PADDING-LEFT: 48PX; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	b) Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT">
	Date: September&#160;8, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT">
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; PADDING-TOP: 10PX; PADDING-LEFT: 0PX; LINE-HEIGHT: NORMAL; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX">

<TR>
<TD COLSPAN="2">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 277PX">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 277PX">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: BOTTOM; PADDING-BOTTOM: 2PX; PADDING-TOP: 2PX; PADDING-LEFT: 2PX; PADDING-RIGHT: 2PX">
<DIV STYLE="OVERFLOW: HIDDEN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: BOTTOM; BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 1PX SOLID; PADDING-BOTTOM: 2PX; PADDING-TOP: 2PX; PADDING-LEFT: 2PX; PADDING-RIGHT: 2PX">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&#160;/s/ Thomas F. Marano
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: BOTTOM; PADDING-BOTTOM: 2PX; PADDING-TOP: 2PX; PADDING-LEFT: 2PX; PADDING-RIGHT: 2PX">
<DIV STYLE="OVERFLOW: HIDDEN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: BOTTOM; PADDING-BOTTOM: 2PX; PADDING-TOP: 2PX; PADDING-LEFT: 2PX; PADDING-RIGHT: 2PX">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Thomas F. Marano
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: BOTTOM; PADDING-BOTTOM: 2PX; PADDING-TOP: 2PX; PADDING-LEFT: 2PX; PADDING-RIGHT: 2PX">
<DIV STYLE="OVERFLOW: HIDDEN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: BOTTOM; PADDING-BOTTOM: 2PX; PADDING-TOP: 2PX; PADDING-LEFT: 2PX; PADDING-RIGHT: 2PX">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Chief Executive Officer and Director
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: BOTTOM; PADDING-BOTTOM: 2PX; PADDING-TOP: 2PX; PADDING-LEFT: 2PX; PADDING-RIGHT: 2PX">
<DIV STYLE="OVERFLOW: HIDDEN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: BOTTOM; PADDING-BOTTOM: 2PX; PADDING-TOP: 2PX; PADDING-LEFT: 2PX; PADDING-RIGHT: 2PX">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(Principal Executive Officer)
</DIV>

<EFX_EXHIBIT_31>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_31_2"></A>
<DIV>
<HR STYLE="HEIGHT: 4PX; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-LEFT: AUTO; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-RIGHT: AUTO" ALIGN="CENTER" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	EXHIBIT&#160;31.2
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_2"></A>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	CERTIFICATION OF PERIODIC REPORT UNDER SECTION&#160;302 OF
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	I, Travis Mayer, certify that:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	1. I have reviewed this annual report on Form&#160;10-K of Intrawest Resorts Holdings, Inc.;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	2. Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	3. Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	4. The registrant&#8217;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&#160;13a-15(e)&#160;and 15d-15(e)) for the registrant and have:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; PADDING-LEFT: 48PX; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	a) Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; PADDING-LEFT: 48PX; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; PADDING-LEFT: 48PX; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	b) Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant&#8217;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; PADDING-LEFT: 48PX; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; PADDING-LEFT: 48PX; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	c) Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant&#8217;s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant&#8217;s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting; and
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	5. The registrant&#8217;s other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant&#8217;s auditors and the audit committee of the registrant&#8217;s board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; PADDING-LEFT: 48PX; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	a) All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant&#8217;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; PADDING-LEFT: 48PX; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; PADDING-LEFT: 48PX; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	b) Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT">
	Date: September&#160;8, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; PADDING-TOP: 10PX; PADDING-LEFT: 0PX; LINE-HEIGHT: NORMAL; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX">

<TR>

<HR STYLE="HEIGHT: 4PX; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-LEFT: AUTO; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-RIGHT: AUTO" ALIGN="CENTER" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">

<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	EXHIBIT&#160;32.1
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_3"></A>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	CERTIFICATION OF CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	AND CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	FURNISHED PURSUANT TO SECTION&#160;906&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF&#160;2002 (18 USC. SECTION&#160;1350)
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	AND FOR THE PURPOSE OF COMPLYING WITH RULE 13a-14(b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	OF THE SECURITIES EXCHANGE ACT OF&#160;1934.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	&#160;The undersigned, the Chief Executive Officer and the Chief Financial Officer of Intrawest Resorts Holdings, Inc. (the &#8220;Company&#8221;) respectively, each hereby certifies that to his knowledge on the date hereof:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	(a) &#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;the Annual Report on Form&#160;10-K of the Company for the fiscal year ended June&#160;30, 2016 filed on the date hereof with the Securities and Exchange Commission (the &#8220;Report&#8221;) fully complies with the requirements of Section&#160;13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934; and
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	(b) &#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;the information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the Company.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: INHERIT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 120%">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; PADDING-TOP: 10PX; PADDING-LEFT: 0PX; LINE-HEIGHT: NORMAL; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX">
<TABLE ID="Z3EDADDF80C59485EA061B47D80D67927" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT: AUTO; WIDTH: 99.6%; MARGIN-RIGHT: AUTO" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
